name: The Curse of Blackwood Castle
description:
Penny, Fawkes, and Li are the hosts of one of the internet’s most popular up-and-coming paranormal investigation shows, Forever Ghostly. Filming their latest season has brought them to all kinds of haunted locales around the country, and for their season finale, they are tackling their biggest obstacle yet - the extremely haunted and very terrifying, Blackwood Castle.

Nestled in the heart of what is known as The Black Wood, Blackwood Castle sits at the base of Black Mountain. There are many legends and spooky tales about the castle within the nearby town of New Haven, ranging from your typical ‘haunted by the souls of the massacred family who built the castle’ to ‘cursed by an evil witch upon its creation’ to ‘the site of many demonic summoning rituals by cultists’ to even ‘might be home to a vampire or a werewolf - or both’. 

Join the three young investigators on their investigation of Blackwood Castle in this thrilling, text-based adventure. Interview locals, choose where your cameras will go, and bunker down for your 12 hour lockdown inside the Castle. Can you keep the three alive until sunrise? Or will you meet a darker fate?

This is an in-progress WIP that I wrote for a class project that I thought other people might enjoy with the way things are going right now. It's 30,000 words total, with 3 playable characters, made with Twine. 

I'm planning to keep working on this, expanding and adding more choices and branching paths. I might even try uploading it to the Choice of Games forums someday (let me know if you think I should).

This game is completely free to play. I hope it brings you a little joy in these trying times. <3

-Kiana
